title: Pezzini Farms
description: Castroville is the artichoke capital. This farm store sells locally grown green globe artichokes plus numerous other farm produce including vegetables, dips and sauces, vinaigarette and oil, seasoning, chips. The store operates a food truck off the side that makes deep-fried artichoke hearts that are without dairy or egg in the batter - be sure to specify no parmesan cheese sprinkle or sauce.
